channel.title: 317 type n' close
channel.description: I type something and then the whole client closes. I am using 317 server as said in title.

System.exit(0);

item.title: 317 type n' close
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=458767.msg3356934#msg3356934 date=1285987680]
I type something in-game and the client closes. Now, by closes I mean like pressing the red X button. Shut down you could say.
[/quote]You’re on Windows 7/Vista, right?
If so, get 32-bit JRE/JDK.[/quote]
Im on windows XP, I said in post.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 type n' close
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

[quote=“jmk600, post:2, topic:362478”]I need help too… i went to the thread then i try to log on and this pops up:

Godpureage v2 is now… ONLINE W00T~!
Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 52855.
Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: client :
Unsupported major.minor version 8242.8224
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(ClassLoader.java:632)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:616)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:14
1)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:283)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(URLClassLoader.java:58)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:197)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:48)
at server.run(server.java:180)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/quote]

you need to go into your settings search 120.0.0.1: 52855 and change that to either 43594 or 5555 then you should be good to go let me know if you have a problem still next time open up a new topic and do not hijack someone elses help thread.

arham 4:

I type something and then the whole client closes. I am using 317 server as said in title.

define type something in, like on the client or in the server logged in as a player/staff?

Read full topic
